summary: Local Deep Research achieves ~95% on SimpleQA benchmark (tested with GPT-4.1-mini). Supports local and cloud LLMs (Ollama, Google, Anthropic, ...). Searches 10+ sources - arXiv, PubMed, web, and your private documents. Everything Local & Encrypted.

title: LiteObject/ollama-agents
summary: Interactive AI agent built with Ollama that enables conversational interactions with web search capabilities. Features multi-turn conversations, real-time web research, and robust error handling using local LLM models.
